Text: Oñ i lewatʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩gweji, ochu e̩ke̩gwe̩ji-wñ, o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu le̩, kʼo̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, e̩ mʼinaku da todu Fero onu Ijipti, kʼe̩ ka ñw u kakini:
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Oñ natʼuwe̩ no̩ tʼane̩pe̩te̩,
U la akʼo̩re̩la-we̩ jo oj uwo uwo,
Naño̩ nʼe̩bie̩-we̩ chʼomiofo kʼu nacherʼane̩
E̩gba kʼu la fʼe̩ kpalu, nakʼe̩wñ bʼojale ma,
Naje̩ ñw e̩wñ ki agane̩ jali efojale-i
Naño̩ kpʼamone̩ amone̩ wewe e̩do̩ bie̩, e̩gba kʼu dʼe̩kpabie̩-we̩ te̩ ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi tʼojane̩ ojane̩ kʼe̩ ma ma mama ta n.

Ochochi, omi aje̩ ñw awuwu-we̩ ki fʼamone̩ amone̩ wewe mu; amonu-ma la arailo todu we̩ bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩, e̩gba kʼu dʼBabilo̩n-mi te̩ añʼuma eju; o̩la-ma la aga iko tʼiko du, o̩la e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ aga tod oji-wñ onugo, o̩jo̩ ewane̩-we̩.
Todu abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, O̩kwo̩-chageli onu Babilo̩n awa bʼe̩ ma.
Omi la aje̩ ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩-we̩ leane̩ alʼo̩kwo̩chageli amagbiti. O̩chaka-ma chʼabo ku ma bailo ef abo uche̩ichi abo uche̩ichi.
Naño̩ kpa ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩-wñ tinyo̩
Tak u naje̩ ñw omi omi-ma ki de̩ jali,
E̩gba kʼu na Iʼane̩ Ijipti chʼalache̩ te̩
Inaku ku ma la ada o̩mo̩ le̩ de̩; amo̩ma onobule̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi anʼinaku le̩ ada; ma anʼe-le̩ dinaku Ijipti kpʼo̩wo̩ one̩-wñ chaka, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
I ño̩ lewatʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩gweji-wñ, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu ochu le̩ kʼo̩la Jihofa lewʼu-gbo mi kakini,

O̩ma one̩, e̩ nakwa tod o̩wo̩ abo Ijipti, kʼe̩ la ko ma ro̩ nʼane̩, owñ chʼowñ onugo kpʼamo̩ma onobule̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ki nʼuwohi, tʼef ugbo ki chʼo̩gane̩ ane̩-ile̩ manyʼabo ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩lo̩ulu.
E̩ne̩ e̩ du alifia?
Ma awane̩ o̩ge̩ge̩de̩ abo kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma; ma mʼowñ du ñw o̩kwo̩chageli me̩; fʼu fa kwʼo̩mo̩ manyʼo̩wo̩ one̩-wñ chaka.
Abo ku ma nʼukpahiu ef amagbiu ako̩la ñw u alumeji o̩jegu, manyʼabo ku ma gbutu ñw u; ma mugwo̩ru le, ma dachi chii; owñ chʼabo ku ma ma de̩pi n, kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma.
Ashur do̩mo̩ kpʼabujo̩-wñ chaka; ojinoji-wñ To daka jo̩; o̩chaka-ma chʼabo ku ma kpa ma, ma wane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli;
ura ura-ma jʼlba iba o̩lo̩ulu, abujo̩-wñ la donyʼura-wñ daka, o̩chaka-ma chʼabo kʼone̩ kpa, ma wane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli; owñ chʼabo ku ma je̩ ñw ailo ki ba oj ane̩ abo ku ma deju.

O̩mo̩ Elam de̩, oñ o̩wo̩ one̩-wñ chaka donyʼojinoji-wñ daka jo̩; abo ku ma kpa ma ma che chaka, ma wane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli, ma nʼe̩pi odukulu-ma gwo̩ru nyʼugbo ki chʼo̩gane̩ ane̩-ile̩-i, owñ chʼabo ku ma je̩ ñw ailo-ma ba one̩ oj ane̩ abo ku ma deju. Anyo̩ la mu ma manyʼabo ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩lo̩ulu.

Ma fʼate̩ nadala te̩ ñw u alumeji abo ku ma kpa, manyʼo̩wo̩ one̩-wñ chaka; ojinoji-wñ jo̩ lʼo̩ daka; o̩chaka-ma chʼabo e̩pi odukulu kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma; todu ailo-ma la ba oj ane̩ abo ku ma deju, oñ anyo̩-ma mu ma manyʼabo ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩lo̩ulu. Ma mʼowñ du te̩ alumeji abo ku ma kpa ma.
O̩mo̩ Me̩she̩k kpai Tubal kpʼo̩wo̩ one̩-ma chaka jo̩; ojinoji-ma lʼuma daka jo̩; o̩chaka-ma chʼabo e̩pi odukulu kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma; todu ama je̩ ñw ailo-ma ki ba oj ane̩ abo ku ma deju.

Ma muda adachi kpe-nyʼamagbiti ef abo e̩pi odukulu ku ma wane̩, ku ma nʼido̩na ogu-ma gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩jegu n. Abo le̩ la mʼoji-ma ko nʼokwo̩chage̩li-ma, oñ udu ku ma fe̩ bʼachiku-ma ma; todu ama chʼe̩wñ ubailo ñw amagbiti oj ane̩ abo ku ma deju.
Ma muda agu uwe̩ che̩ alumeji abo e̩pi odukulu, oñ uwe̩ adachi kpenyʼabo kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma.
O̩mo̩ Ido̩m kpʼamonu-wñ kpʼamidachi-wñ chaka jo̩, alu du kʼukpahiu-ma chaka de̩ o̩mo̩ ma ko ma dachi ef abo kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma. Ma adachi ef abo e̩pi odukulu kpʼabo ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩lo̩ulu.

Amadokanya o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ jʼo̩mo̩ chaka, kpʼabo Saido̩n ku ma gwo̩ru le manyʼabo ku ma kpa; todu ailo du ku ma nʼugbiti-ma anyʼone̩ ailo, anyo̩ mʼuma; oñ ma dachi ef e̩pi odukulu-ma manyʼabo kʼo̩kwochageli kpa ma, oñ anyo̩-ma dʼo̩la-ma manyʼabo ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼo̩lo̩ulu.
Fero ali ma, oñ e̩do̩-wñ anyi tod o̩wo̩ one̩-wñ chaka, owñ che Fero kpʼabogu-wñ kʼo̩kwo̩chageli fu ma kpa du, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Todu u mʼailo du te̩ oj ane̩ abo ku ma deju; ma la amʼowñ du dachi alumeji abo e̩pi odukulu manyʼabo kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma; owñ che Fero kpʼo̩wo̩ one̩-wñ chaka, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
